basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: Well versed with reporting packages, databases (SQL, T-SQL), programming a plus (Python, JavaScript, R), Front-end development. Proven ability to accurately collect, organize, analyse and disseminate substantial amount of information. Proven ability in leveraging data analysis tools and techniques and extracting insights from data and drive resultant business action

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
